Hi Curtis,

Using the following, I could not reproduce doing a sanity check:

Eclipse version = Build id: I20070828-0800 + latest PDE code in HEAD

What extension point were you right-clicking on?  Does it happen for other extension points too?  Is the defining plug-in for the extension point in your workspace?

Adam, can you investigate?

I can't reproduce this either. I'm using I20070828-0800 WITHOUT the latest PDE code from HEAD.

I've tried showing the description of both extension points defined by plug-ins in the workspace and by other plug-ins.

Curtis, any more details?
Curtis, since we are having problems recreating the bug, can you give us some more details on the scenario you ran to see this problem?
I am seeing it myself. It is with a product built on top of Eclipse SDK 3.3.0 GA.

See https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=191973#c3 for more explanation about the NPE.  This bug should be fixed in 3.3.1.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 191973 ***
